TIPS.MSG: Enjoy GunZ: The Duel - A free-to-play action game for life.
If you have any inquiries about GunZ, you may use the Helpdesk function on the GunZ Main Page.
Do you use a router? Try port forwarding to experience optimized network play.
Is GunZ running slow on your computer? Use the optimization feature in the Options menu.
You can use the "Quick Start" function to quickly join a game.
Tell your friends about GunZ. Together you can make a Clan.
Bounty items cannot be shared with other characters through your "Storage".
Use training mode to practice your skills without losing experience points.
Use the chat command '/r' to quickly reply to a whisper.
Any Game ID that may offend others will be restricted.
Anyone who offends others inside a game will be subject to punishment by the operating team.
Never give your password to anyone. The administrator will never ask you for your password.
Do not share your password with anyone. We cannot recover damages caused by hacking.
Please play respectfully to ensure everyone has a better game experience.
A true master's fundamental principle is consideration for others.
Using hacks, illegal programs, or bug exploitation will result in a permanent ban for all associated accounts.
If you successfully defend yourself against a melee attack, you have a chance to perform a Massive Strike right away!
Press the Ctrl key+any Number while in observer mode to assign a number to a player.
